name: Get The Mask
description:
Get The Mask is a super serious game about finding a facemask, when you left yours at home. Getting the mask might look simple, but the path is blocked by various people, that have the coronavirus and will transmit it to you, if you get too close.(Based on a true story)

Music: www.bensound.com

Used assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/city-package-107224#...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/simple-cars-pack-97669#re...
